overview:
I am a creative director and programmer based in Chicago, IL. I design and build websites, iOS apps, kiosks, user interfaces, as well as guide product strategy, copywriting, and user experience design. I previously worked for Wolfram Research, makers of Mathematica and Wolfram Alpha. I have worked with clients such as GE, O’Reilly Media, and several technology startups. My work has been featured prominently by Wired Magazine, Apple, The New York Times, MSNBC, the BBC, Computer Arts Magazine, Communication Arts, Macworld, and Gizmodo.

I cofounded and run Build & Company, a studio dedicated to bringing sophisticated and intuitive design to technology products.
